Question: This person, who never received formal music training or learned to read music, studied and played by ear.
Hints: On March 24, this person was inducted into the U.S Army as a private at Fort Chaffee, near Fort Smith, Arkansas.
Jesse Garon ****, his identical twin brother, was delivered stillborn 35 minutes before him.
By the time he graduated from high school in June 1953, this person had already singled out music as his future.
